website_summaries.verdict: A reasonably priced HP monitor featuring the basics that anyone needs, including a crystal-clear display and a removable stand for mounting to a wall or swivel-stand.
cons: The stand does not swivel, but you can tilt the display as needed

customer_reviews.title: wanted to like this monitor... but couldn't
customer_reviews.text: I hoped to use this monitor for gaming and light video editing work. Given that this is a bargain level monitor, I was not expecting perfection, but I was very disappointed by the low contrast and washed out colors produced by this monitor. I tried adjusting the settings, but could not get a pleasing result. It did not meet my needs, so I ended up returning the monitor. It is possible I just got a lemon.
customer_reviews.author: Matt S

customer_reviews.title: Bad monitor, should have returned it right away
customer_reviews.text: Bad monitor, should have returned it right away. Defect is wavy lines across screen (horizontally across entire screen), most obvious when it's a white background. Was minor the first couple of weeks, just a few lines at a couple of place. Got a bit worse. And now after a few months, it's such a distraction to make the monitor a piece of garbage (backup monitor if the new one I replace it with dies). I've had good luck in my life with monitors, this is the first piece of garbage I bought, never had a problem before. Shop around for another, don't be fooled by the good price.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Bali

customer_reviews.title: Great Second Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Had to get a second monitor to work from home. This one was a great deal and the size was great. The display is clean and crisp and it was super easy to set up. Just two cords, power and display. If you are setting this up as a third monitor you will need the DVI cord not the VGA cord that comes with it. (But that is standard for any third display. Would highly recommend for a work screen
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Easy for 76-yr old grandma to set up
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, and I was able to get it set up myself without out asking my tech-superior son, who rolls his eyes when I ask for help. Bright colors, easy to read everything on screen, and granddaughters love for their grade-school level grames.
customer_reviews.author: L. S. Wier

customer_reviews.title: so that should tell you it's viewable quality is quite good. I like that there is button wording on ...
customer_reviews.text: The monitor is very light, and the color it produces is right on, and only slight light bleeding on the sides, nothing that distracts, and it's less than my Samsung 32", so that should tell you it's viewable quality is quite good. I like that there is button wording on the lower right hand corner, that allows for easy manipulation of the buttons behind the panel, very easy to use. My only complaint, I wish they would throw in a HDMI cord, but I understand at this price, one can't really complain, for it's truly a bargain for its quality.
customer_reviews.author: SoulD

customer_reviews.title: It’s definitely a monitor
customer_reviews.text: I use this basically to have my email up at work and sometimes to drag a second screen from my laptop. Can’t speak much to clarity but seems nice Bc it’s just web browsers I’m strong at. I’ve watched YouTube videos and the clarity is what I’d expect it to be. Overall worth the money. If you’re using it strictly for work I don’t see why you’d spend extra money. If you’re using it for gaming however, you may want to look elsewhere Bc I’m sure their is better quality graphics. But this does what I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these monitors
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two of these and they've been great. I like the size for the graphic design work I do and my son likes his for the games he plays. They are surprisingly light, but the base keeps them in place. The only minor downside is that they are not very adjustable; the monitor can tilt a little bit to change the up and down angle, but there is no adjustment for height.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby S.

customer_reviews.title: Bought 3
customer_reviews.text: I have a 3 monitor display and bought 3 of this model for it. They all work very well for my purposes (Left=movies, middle=Rimworld, Right=web surfing). The only caution is to check your computers ports beforehand, as each of ours only had two HDMI ports and a displayport, so we each had to buy adapters for our monitor setups, which was disappointing when each had all these beautiful new monitors we wanted to use. The monitors themselves are great though and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Display went out after 6 months.
customer_reviews.text: We had this monitor all of 6 months, then the screen display began to go blank. We could never get anything done on it because the screen would go blank for a few seconds, then come back on for maybe a minute then go blank again. Almost like there was a loose connection inside. Of course we checked the power cables, put it on a different computer but the terrible performance never changed. We sure expected much, much more from HP. Now we're stuck with this piece of junk and can't return.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Just got 3 of these... These monitors are great. I wasn't expecting them to be so clear and bring at their price. Very very good so far. Haven't tried having yet, but for regular computing and Netflix, they look great!
customer_reviews.author: Skull One

customer_reviews.title: Total junk
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY - the colors are so washed out, dark and completely not accurate of reality that it is a joke. If you don't mind not having the color blue, and having purple that looks like grey, or blue that looks like grey, or red that looks like grey - this is your monitor. No amount of tweaking the profiles and calibration settings results in colors that are acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: and writer whom all enjoy it immensely
customer_reviews.text: This is a really high-quality monitor, and with all the competition that's important, as this was one of the less expensive ones! It is used by a professional designer, salesperson, and writer whom all enjoy it immensely. The color is terrific and it's easy to see even from some angles.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy K

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice monitor for a reasonable price. Very happy with it. Color is good, and the image is crisp.
customer_reviews.author: Lnau

customer_reviews.title: Good overall
customer_reviews.text: Got this bc decently priced 60hz monitor(its set on 59hz tho, left it cause its no real difference) Was trying to get the lowest possible brightness, seeing that it was only 250cd/m2 while most other screens are 300+. Guess most if not all monitors are bright af(yes its on 0) One thing I failed to take note of when purchasing was that it was 5ms.... owell. It works so, u get what u paid for(in a good way in this case).
customer_reviews.author: Peter Nil

customer_reviews.title: Perfect, affordable, light, and more
customer_reviews.text: This HP does what I was told it would do. It is affordable, light, and fits nice on my desk. My HP 22w77 died on me and I needed to replace it as fast as I could paying as much as I had available and I found this one. It is not close to my previous monitor regarding features and capabilities, but at least I can see my computer. I give 5 starts because I received what I bought and nicely packed. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: WheelCovers4u

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed
customer_reviews.text: This was to be a replacement for a simple accounting computer monitor. What could go wrong? This is a very light-weight monitor, everything plastic. While resolution is 1920x1080, the image is very washed out. I performed a calibration using the online lagom test suite. Nothing helped. I ended up swapping this monitor with a less often used computer that had a better quality, albeit older, Dell monitor. My advice would be to spend a little more and get a better monitor, regardless what you use your monitor for.
customer_reviews.author: Randy in LA

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor
customer_reviews.text: I bought this one so I would have two HP24uh monitors. I've had one 24uh for over a year with no issues. Now I have a dual monitor setup...yea! For around 120 bucks, it's great. Kudo's to the the vendor for putting monitor in another larger box for shipping. Monitor arrived in perfect condition...the outer box, not so much. Good deal.
customer_reviews.author: The Big Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this monitor to replace an older 14" square screen that my brother-in-law was still using. They live in the mountains and get poor TV reception, relying on the internet from time to time to watch TV and movies. They have been very happy with the quality and performance of this monitor. Many of the monitors in this price range do have 3 inputs, but this one has HDMI, DVI-D and VGA. The monitor arrived right on time and was well packaged. I would definitely buy this monitor again, either for myself or for another person.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Ireland

customer_reviews.title: Great Price/Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, crystal clear and the price was very competitive. Easy setup as you would expect. (** Make sure you double check what cable you want/need. It comes with a VGA cable, but I bought a Display port to VGA adapter).
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bruzik

customer_reviews.title: Great TV, Great Price
customer_reviews.text: We've had this TV for several months now and think it's one of the best values on Amazon. Crisp picture, built in Roku and easy to set up. We bought it to replace another brand that failed after just a few years and can't be more pleased
customer_reviews.author: Jim Kelley

customer_reviews.title: Fine for a budget monitor
customer_reviews.text: I have two of these. One valiantly continues to try to live, but has developed some kind of hardware issue that causes it to constantly disconnect and reconnect from the CPU. This monitor is less than 3 years old, but maybe my standards are too high.
customer_reviews.author: ESM

customer_reviews.title: Like the monitors
customer_reviews.text: Like the monitors, but I didn't realize the color and intensity of the graphics really change based on sightline angle. Wish there was a product that wouldn't change brightness and resolution based on whether you're looking at them straight-on, or looking slightly down at them or slightly up. That said, good price and they meet my need.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Images Monitor
customer_reviews.text: What can I say other than I love it. I would definately purchase it again. The graphics are sharp and clear. Plenty of screen space. I love the power button on the bottom. Instead of pushing it in like most it's like a toggle switch. For me that makes finding it so much easier and I know I am pushing the right button to turn it off.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Loncar

customer_reviews.title: Solid for the price
customer_reviews.text: It's a very standard monitor, Good size but a fat back so beware of that if you need all the space you can get. Terrible viewing angles, but you can't get quality this good for this price without caveats, and no internal speakers. If i could find a monitor at this price point, with better viewing angles and *maybe* internal speakers, i'd not recommend this, but good luck with that. It's about the main reason i got it.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmie

customer_reviews.title: awesome working great
customer_reviews.text: awesome working great, perfect 4 my everyday mail checking ,youtubes etc,good price,perfect size, comes with ac cabel and 1 cheap other cable to connect it to ur monitor, this is it what i wanted, cheap one but good 1 4 my everyday use in 24 inch, GREAT !
customer_reviews.author: robin minstrel

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: pretty good budget monitor. i like how it’s thin and has clear images, i don’t use it for gaming just for work and youtube videos, etc worth every dollar, buy it! i promise you won’t regret it
customer_reviews.author: Seth Rollins

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor "gets it done"
customer_reviews.text: Unite is pretty basic when viewing up close or magnifying up close to photos. Things can get a little washed out. but the price is right and you get what you paid for. my wife likes it because it doesn't take up to much space on her desk, But if she's happy I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: T. Severson

customer_reviews.title: 1 out of 3 Died in Less Than Two Months
customer_reviews.text: Bought 3 of these monitors, one of them is already dead less than two months later. However, they did immediately send a replacement, and the monitors themselves are excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TechMama

customer_reviews.title: VGA Cable Instead of HDMI
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is a standard, no bells-or-whistles setup. No complaints on the basics. The thing that gets me is the monitor has an HDMI port but still ships with a VGA cable. Can we please stop holding onto this less-than-stellar old technology? My latest rounds of company desktops don't even come with VGA ports. VGA is outdated and these HDMI monitors shouldn't be shipping with them. Switch to shipping HDMI cables and watch your ratings go up!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Monitor
customer_reviews.text: I didn't think I wanted a monitor this wide, but I am getting use to it and like it a lot. It works very well. I don't usually play games on it so can't really rate it for that. I mostly use it for email, photos, using Word, just basic things. It works well for what I use it for and I'm sure it would work well for games also.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor, no set up needed, perfect picture quality. Use for email, browsing, photo editing, doc processing, light gaming, streaming video content.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Guys so far so go, Only had it for a few days but it works great....Only time will tell hope 4 the best.Glad to see circuit city is still going.
customer_reviews.author: ted

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I got it so I could use my laptop with an extra screen on homework, and it was larger than i expected, so it ended up becoming my YouTube monitor. at $120, I can say this is worth it. Can't wait to get back home so I can use my other monitor I bought on here and have 3 screens (for triple the productivity of course)
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor, bright, high resolution
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor. I purchased this as a second monitor to my company laptop while I work from home. Very pleased with my purchase. High resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A. Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great price, using it for dual monitor setup
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality picture, especially at this price. Bought it as a second monitor. Used an HDMI cable to connect it to my all-in-one desktop and now I have a dual monitor setup.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Nice display at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice display at a good price. I find HP products to be reliable and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Pearly

customer_reviews.title: HP 24 is the way to go!
customer_reviews.text: 24" is the way to go and HP is an excellent choice. I trust HP on allot of electronic equipment and have always been satisfied with the quality that they put into their products.
customer_reviews.author: Gator Spotter

customer_reviews.title: Got this one based on reviews and am very happy with it
customer_reviews.text: Had a really old monitor that started acting up. Got this one based on reviews and am very happy with it. Easy to hook up and the screen is nice and bright compared to my old monitor. Really like everything about it!
customer_reviews.author: C. Honeycutt

customer_reviews.title: Very easy set-up, and just 'worked' without any complications
customer_reviews.text: The display arrived within the timeframe expected. Very easy set-up, and just 'worked' without any complications. I've been using it now for several weeks as an 2nd / extended display for my laptop at my home office, and it is really nice to have this much screen real estate to work with. (my prior 2nd screen was an old 19" flat screen display.)
customer_reviews.author: Richard L. Bolstad

customer_reviews.title: Item exactly as described!  Very nice monitor!
customer_reviews.text: I would definitely buy from this retailer again. The monitor arrived new, clean, and very well-packaged. The picture quality is great! 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Rick Schone

customer_reviews.title: Decent basic monitor.
customer_reviews.text: Works as expected. Its a basic monitor with standard resolution. It does have an HDMI port which is what I wanted. I didn't notice any bleeding or dead pixels. Basically my last 3 monitors were HP and all seemed to do well.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: I was very surprised at how high quality everything this ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised at how high quality everything this monitor gave. The build is incredible, the color brightness and temperature were made the colors on the screen pop.
customer_reviews.author: Scott&AshRamboz

customer_reviews.title: A good sized monitor
customer_reviews.text: The picture is pretty good. Alas, I liked my old HP monitor with gooseneck flat square pedestal better. (A place to stash my bills)
customer_reviews.author: Cecil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Monitor works great as a plug in desktop monitor for my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: dstew

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor -- needs better installation guide.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice monitor -- good picture clarity. My only issue is that it didn't come with any instructions on how to get the aspect ratio from the PC to correctly display on the screen. I basically just poked around until it somehow started working.
customer_reviews.author: JoelR

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks good in use.
customer_reviews.text: It does all I could want it for. Used for a computer monitor and looks quite good.
customer_reviews.author: David C

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended for those just needing basic features,  not for gaming, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I have had this 24 inch HP monitor for 3 months now. It was a piece of cake to set up and connect to my PC. I use the factory default settings so I have not fooled with lighting or contrast or any other features it might have. I just use it for the internet, e-mails and some personal uses, but no gaming. So to me the picture is perfect and free of any glitches. I would highly recommend this monitor to any person with similar usage requirements compared to a more expensive model. Why pay more if you don't need the features???
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Good 24" monitor and really good price compared to other brands. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Beth P

customer_reviews.title: Nice For Office Use
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. I have a pair of them on my desk, and they work very well. Not the sharpest picture quality, but OK for office use.
customer_reviews.author: Ohio Dad

customer_reviews.title: Good Monitor for the Price
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad montior for the price. Picture is good, not great. Not many adjustments but overall good monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Erik

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for buck, solid quality.
customer_reviews.text: Great! Did what it's supposed to do. Great quality, great picture, very easy setup. Would recommend. Also, it feels VERY big, as big as I'd really want a monitor to be. I have it a little higher than my bed, and sometimes watch television on it while laying down. It's got a slight problem with viewing angle when you watch it from too low, but I think that's a problem shared by all LCD moniters.
customer_reviews.author: Sam L.

customer_reviews.title: Bought for Work
customer_reviews.text: I added a second monitor on my desk at work. I is a nice monitor and I really like it.
customer_reviews.author: John B

customer_reviews.title: Product stopped working in less than 30 days
customer_reviews.text: We received a 24 inch monitor (HP 24uh) on August 7, 2020. On October 23, 2020 it ceased working. It will not power up. We have checked all conections, and tried a different electric outlet. Our rating had been 5, and is now a 1.
customer_reviews.author: rlr0846

customer_reviews.title: Very good price. It does not blow you away
customer_reviews.text: Very good price. It does not blow you away, but it is absolutely worth what you pay for it and that's good enough for me. Very easy to put together and set up.
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: Performs as Expected
customer_reviews.text: The monitor came quickly and seems to be working just fine. Do not use for high end graphics and have had it for a short time. Cannot comment on reliability at this time.
customer_reviews.author: Miata 2003

customer_reviews.title: this is a good everyday monitor
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this is a good everyday monitor. The monitor is easy on the eye and quite clear. The only downside is the monitor doesn't adjust vertically.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Bitner

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Came in on time and in great shape. They were actually better quality than I was expecting. I work long days in front of the computer and these don't bother my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Great value and quality
customer_reviews.text: For the value, this is exactly what I wanted. Two large monitors to use my laptop as a desktop while at home.
customer_reviews.author: Lance M.

customer_reviews.title: ... for who knows what reason and this was an excellent replacement. It the same size as the monitor ...
customer_reviews.text: My main monitor went our for who knows what reason and this was an excellent replacement. It the same size as the monitor but MUCH lighter. It is performing great!
customer_reviews.author: David D

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: works great! let it warm up to room temp before i powered it up.
customer_reviews.author: fieldhand1

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is great so far, I have been using it for the past few months and have had no issues with it. The color and resolution is beautiful. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Corrine

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor for the price!
customer_reviews.text: This is monitor is perfect for my needs and was a great price. I would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good monitor, short stand, may require additional monitor stand
customer_reviews.text: its a good monitor, but the stand was too short and not height adjustable, so I had to purchase a stand to put under the monitor
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding image contrast & brightness
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding image contrast & brightness, best I've seen in dozens of monitors. I bought another for a second computer.
customer_reviews.author: MAP-LKP

customer_reviews.title: I like it..
customer_reviews.text: Nice monitor. You really can't go wrong with HP products.
customer_reviews.author: RedSled

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: An excellent monitor for the price. Great image, looks nice, works great with my Windows 10 workstation.
customer_reviews.author: Andacar

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice!
customer_reviews.text: Great Monitor - Vivid colors, Good refresh rate. Product arrived in good condition and has been working without issue.
customer_reviews.author: MasterDon

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Bought several of these monitors and have yet to experience issues. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: bz6039

customer_reviews.title: Controls are not that clear in operation
customer_reviews.text: Tried to control the brightness, and this is pretty confusing. Even after multiple attempts, have the monitor set to very high contrast and brightness. Some set of instructions along this line would have been helpful. Otherwise it is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: RSH

customer_reviews.title: Great display at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor. Nice and crisp colors, great sharpness. Stays very cool as well.
customer_reviews.author: Andy F. Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Use for a work computer as the primary monitor
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box plug it in and connect to the computer. It couldn’t have been easier. Great picture quality.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff S.

customer_reviews.title: Happy Customer
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. I use it as a second screen for my studio to view the mixer, sends, etc., while working on my tracks. Easy to adjust and match screens. Only reason I give it 4 stars is because the other HP monitor I have, the all in one, still kills the picture. All in all really good monitor for the price and I like my HP products.
customer_reviews.author: H. S.

customer_reviews.title: easy to install
customer_reviews.text: Looks great....very easy for this 73 year old Grandma to do alone. !!!!
customer_reviews.author: skwj

customer_reviews.title: Telework Addition
customer_reviews.text: Due to the COVID-19, the monitor was a welcome addition to my laptop while teleworking at home. Vendor delivered as promised.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Picture quality good, Light weight. No speakers, connections from bottom of monitor.
customer_reviews.text: looks great! HD quality, very light weight. Check the news and watch YouTube. Still play company of hero's from time to time. Occasional letter. Works for my needs.
customer_reviews.author: Mike-Smoke

customer_reviews.title: Great office work quality.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not gaming quality, but very very good quality for any type of home office work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Size
customer_reviews.text: For those of you working from home, this is the perfect size.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor
customer_reviews.text: This is the best monitor I have had. It is huge and it helps me see things on the screen so much better. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: bbbjsanders

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor.
customer_reviews.text: It's slightly bigger than my old monitor and I'm liking the size. Crisp and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: This was soooo much better than using my laptop screen. I can see documents clearer. HP products are pretty great anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Trinity M Williams

customer_reviews.title: works great and the color is
customer_reviews.text: replaced an outdated monitor with this. works great and the color is brilliant
customer_reviews.author: Robert  V

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Works great - plugged into a HP computer. Auto-detect works, resolution is great.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the screen just wish it had built in speakers
customer_reviews.author: Sid

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor!
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as expected. Easy setup. Really liked it that I purchased a second one.
customer_reviews.author: tvibftt

customer_reviews.title: This monitor is awesome! I watch Hulu and Netflix on this computer ...
customer_reviews.text: This monitor is awesome! I watch Hulu and Netflix on this computer and this has a very nice picture and also gives you a nice computer game screen and giant facebook!
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Large and clear. I had another HP monitor that lasted over 15 years (my husband still has his) so I trust their quality. Still very pleased with it after a month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Windi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: They might not use this for the manned Space X rocket someday, but for me it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Dorthy Gale

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. Colors and contrast are crisp. Could not be better
customer_reviews.author: San Clemente Dog Mom

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and color.
customer_reviews.text: Great picture for the price. If you want more in depth color purchase an IPS monitor. This item does a great job of color rendering for the price.
customer_reviews.author: TonyS

customer_reviews.title: Good monitor for cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent monitor for a smart mirror. The casing is easy to pull off. The monitor is inexpensive. The picture quality is solid. I would not even mind using these as my normal monitor due to the price.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Piper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love to watch my movies and shows on the computer....this is a great monitor.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Von Zipper

customer_reviews.title: so far its a  good monitor..
customer_reviews.text: its good and it havent gave me trouble so far/
customer_reviews.author: RoseM. H.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Screen is not as bright and pictures not as crisp but over all good
customer_reviews.author: Ron Collins

customer_reviews.title: Good Monitor
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the money. I have no complaints about this product.
customer_reviews.author: Earl D Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Ordered to have as extra and keep at parent's.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this monitor to keep at my parent's house for when I go visit and still have to work. It works great. I have no issues with it whatsoever.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice design, not a lot a plastic as in other displays
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Nice monitor, good price.
customer_reviews.text: Great monitor for the price. Next time I think I'll get one with more glare reduction.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great after a long set up!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent screen. I gave it only 4 stars because the picture was so off that it took me three hours to adjust - color, hue, brightness, pixels, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice screen. Wish the monitor stand allowed it to ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice screen. Wish the monitor stand allowed it to raise and lower. This model only tilts. Stand height is static. Screen feels a bit short as it is 21.5inch and not 22inch diagonal.
customer_reviews.author: Fibre1

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much improved over my old 17" monitor. Colors are brighter and clearer.
customer_reviews.author: upnorth76

product_meta.title: HP 24uh 24-inch LED Backlit Monitor
feature_bullets: Affordable and stylish: Ideally priced to use as a primary or secondary monitor for work or play at home. HP monitors are designed as ‘plug and play’ for all OS

Crisp and clear images: Enjoy the vivid picture quality of the 24-inch diagonal Full HD display with the clarity of 1920x1080 resolution,(1) 10M:1 dynamic contrast ratio,(2) exceptional 5ms response time,(2) and VGA, DVI-D, and HDMI connectivity
Earth conscious: The LED backlit LCD monitor is designed to use less power and meets strict energy efficiency guidelines set by the Environmental Protection Agency and U.S. Department of Energy
Versatile viewing: Adjust your vantage point by easily tilting between -4 Degree~22 Degree. Brightness-250 cd/m². Contrast ratio-1000:1 static, 10000000:1 dynamic
Union between computer and monitor: The included VGA cable provides a reliable connection between your computer and monitor and is identified by 15 pins displayed on three rows
